metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14424 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cacti before 1.2.18 allows remote attackers to trigger XSS via template import for the midwinter theme.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14424` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: sbeattie> d12800ab479 landed in 1.2.18, 0234c1b645d in 1.2.12, which fixed XSS in other themes.

criterions.comment: cacti package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1').
